xml.data:
Home » 13S3 Khandhavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 5 Uppādasaṃyutta » 5.1 Uppādavagga
5.1.8 Taṇhāsutta
Uppādasaṃyutta
Uppādavagga
Taṇhāsutta
319.
1083Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Yo kho, bhikkhave, rūpataṇhāya uppādo ṭhiti…pe…  jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo…pe…  yo dhammataṇhāya uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo, dukkhasseso uppādo, rogānaṃ ṭhiti, jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo. Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpataṇhāya nirodho…pe…  jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo…pe…  yo dhammataṇhāya nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogānaṃ vūpasamo, jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo”ti.
1084Aṭṭhamaṃ.
<< 5.1.7 Sañcetanāsuttaup5.1.9 Dhātusutta >>
